item.title: Fire Cape lava speed
item.dc:creator: @mikeyrock mikeyrock
item.description:
@mikeyrock wrote:

Hey guys I’v been having this problem for a while and it sucks that so far no one could help me. Anyways, when I weild the fire cape, the lava on the cape moves way to fast and it hurts my eyes. I was wondering if anyone could help me reduce the speed of the lava on the fire cape. So far what I’v done (I’m not sure if this is correct), is that in the client folder, I opened up Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3 (JAVA) and under where it says

public static final int[] method371(int i)
{

I put:

if (i == 40)
	{
	i = 31;
	} 
if (i == 31)
	{
	i = 40;
	}

I used texture 40 for: lava and texture 31 for: Another lava overlay.

But I think that only adds lava to the cape and doesn’t slow it down in any way so it didn’t really help yet. If anyone has a solution to my problem, please post. I’d appriciate it.

Thanks

-Mike

Read full topic
